# MEComposeSessionError.Code.invalidBody

**Case**

An error code that indicates the message’s body is invalid.

## Declaration

```swift
case invalidBody
```

## Indicating Erroneous States

- **MEComposeSessionError.Code.invalidHeaders**: An error code that indicates one or more of the message’s headers are invalid.
- **MEComposeSessionError.Code.invalidRecipients**: An error code that indicates one or more of the message’s recipients are invalid.
